text.text: A personal and professional timeline of key milestones.

text.headline: Retail store manager
text.text: Worked in retail roles from 2015 to 2019 before transitioning to tech.

text.headline: Bachelor of Science in Informatics and Telecommunications
text.text: Finished all coursework for my degree in Informatics & Telecommunications.

text.headline: Intern Data engineer at Netcompany - Intrasoft
text.text: Started a data engineering internship that later turned into a full-time role.

text.headline: Data Engineer at Netcompany - Intrasoft
text.text: Focused on on-premise big data solutions using Spark and Scala.

text.headline: Data Engineer at Waymore
text.text: Led the delivery of a real-time data platform using Spark, Kafka, and GCP.
